names.pinyin: long kui she mei yi mi tang
names.english: solanum nigrum, duchesnea and coix decoction
names.commonEnglish: Solanum Nigrum, Duchesnea and Coix Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, activates the Blood, promotes urination and unblocks painful urinary dysfunction.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood and removes toxicity.
Strengthens the Spleen, resolves Dampness, expels Wind-Dampness, relieves pain and clears Damp-Heat.
With Fu Ling, for Spleen Deficiency with Excess Dampness and edema.
Activates the Blood, dispels Stasis, promotes urination, reduces swelling and edema, clears Heat and resolves toxicity.
With Ze Lan, for disorders which include both Blood Stasis and accumulation of pathogenic water.
Dispels Heat and Dampness, removes toxins, eliminates Wind, promotes urination, regulates the circulation of Qi and activates the Blood.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Kidney Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
With Cang Zhu, eliminates Dampness and clears Heat for Lower Jiao Damp-Heat with pain, swelling and weakness in the lower limbs.
Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
With Huang Bai, for pain, swelling and weakness of the lower extremities or skin lesions due to Wind-Dampness.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes ) the Blood, clears Deficiency Fire, activates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and promotes urination.
Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and cools the Blood.
Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, promotes urination and disperses swellings.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
Dispels Wind, disperses Wind-Heat, stops itching and pain, transforms Phlegm and eliminates toxins.
Clears Heat
Resolves toxins
Activates the Blood
Resolves Dampness

symptoms: Edema of the four limbs, which, when pressed, easily rebound
